timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <version>2.7</version>
          
          
            
                    <version>2.8.0</version>
          
      
    
    
  

Why upgrade to an outdated release?
timeline.author: jvz

replies.bodyText: Because 2.8.0 was released yesterday, after my PR 😠 🤦‍♂️
replies.author: MRamonLeon

replies.bodyText:
I see:

Removed read from InfiniteCircularInputStreamtop
Some serialVersionUID changes on serializable interfaces.

Not a big problem from my PoV
replies.author: MRamonLeon

replies.bodyText: LMAO I just noticed that after commenting as the announce email hadn't even been sent yet until like an hour after I said this!
replies.author: jvz

replies.bodyText: I just learnt a new acronym. Seriously, it's a parallel language 😆
replies.author: MRamonLeon

timeline.message:
Update commons-io to 2.8.0 just released

Co-authored-by: Matt Sicker <boards@gmail.com>
